Summary: circular ball west of arvada north of golden co. moving quickly, appering for ten minutes or so three days in a row slighlly orange in color
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Detailscircular balls that moved very quickly in a triangular patteren. This was sometime ago and I am wondering if you have any other sightings of this nature around this time period above the Golden Colorado area. We were outside the front of our house. There were my wife, and three of our children who saw this. We saw it several days in a row. We have always wondered. We do not know what it was just that it was not anything that any of us have ever seen before or since.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Arvada
There were no other sightings in Arvada on or around May 31st 2002
